Name: The Doll's Window
About the game: Alva follows a mysterious girl named Elma, who may be an end to their despair. Elma latches onto Alva, who holds the key to her release. Together, they try to escape the labyrinth lying under the pretense of a circus. Together, they try to find a way to be freed. ♢♢♢♢♢ A horror exploration game that takes place in an underground labyrinth. Navigate your way through various traps and mazes. Dodge malicious creations that are perpetually hungry. Depart from the nightmares that constantly haunt you. Features Advance through different levels of the labyrinth. Uncover stories and converse with others to survive. Solve puzzles by finding bits of what's past. Find another puzzle within a puzzle. Try and stop the memories that torment you. Avoid those who are eager to consume your soul. Controls Arrow keys — Movement Enter or Space bar — Interact Save — Interact with Rabbit Dolls X or Escape — Check Inventory W or F12 — Return to Title screen F5 — Toggle Fullscreen/Window modes F1 — View/Change display settings To use Steam Overlay, please change the screenshot key settings to another key other than F12, F5, or F1.
